short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Invite and direct guests to your meeting with the click of a link.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create a seamless meeting experience by integrating Mapsted’s chrome extension with your existing Google Calendar. Simply schedule, invite and provide routing directions to your next event or meeting. 

Mapsted’s Chrome Extension allows participants to create, invite, and send turn-by-turn directions to their next event or meeting by sharing a link in the invitation with all the necessary meeting details. Guests can navigate their way to the meeting with an interactive intelligent map and turn-by-turn routing. 

Simply open the meeting invitation, click on the provided link, and easily navigate to the location of the meeting using a digital map and intuitive directions. 

Mapsted offers multiple location-based solutions that can power your business. Learn more by visiting https://mapsted.com/

Easily find your way indoors with Mapsted.
